main_definition: Not present or not existing in a particular place, situation, or time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Missing from a location or event
meanings_and_examples.example: He was absent from the meeting when it began.
She felt absent-minded during her exam because she wasn't well rested.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not in a particular situation, often referring to someone not participating actively
meanings_and_examples.example: The new intern was quite absent during the team meeting; he didn't ask any questions or contribute much.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A legal absence from school without permission
meanings_and_examples.example: His truancy record shows that he has been frequently absent without valid reason.
